>>> comments
a b ; c d
e; f g
;h i
;j k

<<< comments
"a" ' '
"b" ' '
"" '\n'
"e" '\n'
"" '\n'
"" '\x00'


>>> multiline
a b c=d e="f g" (
 h=i j="k l"
) m n
( o p )

<<< multiline
"a" ' '
"b" ' '
"c=d" ' '
"e=\"f" ' '
"g\"" ' '
"h=i" ' '
"j=\"k" ' '
"l\"" '\n'
"m" ' '
"n" '\n'
"o" ' '
"p" ' '
